sentence.text: There is a car race near our town every year.
sentence.textCn: 在我们镇子附近每年都有一场汽车比赛。

sentence.text: In 1995, there was a very big race.
sentence.textCn: 1995 年举行了一次盛大的比赛。

sentence.text: There were hundreds of people there.
sentence.textCn: 许许多多人都去了赛场。

sentence.text: My wife and I were at the race.
Our friends Julie and Jack were there, too.
sentence.textCn: 我们的朋友朱莉和杰克也去了。

sentence.text: You can see us in the crowd.
sentence.textCn: 你可以在人群中看到我们。

sentence.text: We are standing on the left.
There were twenty cars in the race.
sentence.textCn: 参加比赛的有20 辆汽车。

sentence.text: There were English cars, French cars, German cars, Italian cars, American cars and Japanese cars.
sentence.textCn: 有英国、法国、德国、意大利、美国和日本的汽车。
比赛的结尾是激动人心的。
获胜者是比利·斯图尔特。

sentence.text: He was in car number fifteen.
Five other cars were just behind him.
sentence.textCn: 其他 5 辆汽车紧跟在他后面。

sentence.text: On the way home, my wife said to me, 'Don't drive so quickly!
sentence.textCn: 在回家的途中，我妻子对我说：“别开得这样快！你可不是比利·斯图尔特！”
你可不是比利·斯图尔特！”
